title: The Legend of the Solstice
description: GROWING UP IS REALIZING YOU MIGHT NOT BE ALL THAT HUMAN . . .Thousands of miles apart, three strangers share nothing but a birthday and a secret that will kill them if they can't remember it in time.After their twentieth birthdays, Ethan, Isolde, and Ridley begin to develop frightening powers none of them understand. Ethan meets a stranger who claims to understand him and his abilities, Ridley has vivid dreams of a man she can’t remember sharing a life with, and Isolde embarks on a journey forced upon her by the ocean itself.With ancient enemies, past loves, and a forgotten war, three stories culminate into one fable of fate and mythology.
author: Lauren Evers
